entries.title: US neo-Nazi charged in plot to attack Baltimore power stations
entries.description: Federal Bureau of Investigation says alleged plan to disrupt power stations in US city was racially motivated.

entries.title: Who is Gautam Adani and why is he controversial?
entries.description: The Indian entrepreneur has seen his wealth plummet after a research firm accused him of 'brazen stock manipulation'.

entries.title: US pledges post-earthquake aid, but no contact with Syria’s Assad
entries.description: State Department says Turkey can count on US for 'anything' it needs in aftermath of devastating earthquakes.

entries.title: Thousands dead after powerful quakes devastate Turkey and Syria
entries.description: Death toll rises as major temblors rocked Turkey and Syria while rescuers frantically search for survivors in the cold.

entries.title: Timeline: World’s deadliest earthquakes since 2000
entries.description: From Haiti to Turkey, quakes have wreaked havoc. Here is a list of the deadliest tremors since 2000.

entries.title: Argentina rugby players sentenced in high-profile beating death
entries.description: The death of 18-year-old Fernando Baez Sosa has spurred debate over the role of race and class in Argentinian society.

entries.title: Is Russia extending its reach in Africa?
entries.description: Russia's foreign minister visits African countries to shore up support as Wagner Group replaces French troops.

entries.title: Ex-military ruler Pervez Musharraf’s body brought to Pakistan
entries.description: Former president, 79, died on Sunday after a prolonged illness at a hospital in Dubai, where he lived in exile.

entries.title: UN chief warns of ‘wider war’ as Ukraine conflict intensifies
entries.description: Antonio Guterres says prospects of 'further escalation and bloodshed' in the Russia-Ukraine war keep growing.

entries.title: In war-ravaged Idlib, devastating quake feels like ‘Doomsday’
entries.description: Thousands homeless in opposition-held areas hit by tremor as infrastructure already weakened by bombings falters.

entries.title: Balloon sighted over Latin America is from China, Beijing says
entries.description: Chinese foreign ministry says balloon spotted over Colombia is of a 'civilian nature and used for flight tests'.

entries.title: Why some EU countries in the east are still pro-Russia
entries.description: Despite recent memories of Russian aggression, some Eastern European states still fall for Russian disinformation.

entries.title: US authorities enforce evacuations after train derails in Ohio
entries.description: Derailment threatens release of toxic gas and explosion that could launch shrapnel in Ohio town, officials say.

entries.title: Chile’s president urges unity amid battle to contain fatal fires
entries.description: International assistance is arriving as Chile struggles to control hundreds of wildfires that have scorched communities.

entries.title: Turkey’s Gaziantep goes from a refuge to a site of devastation
entries.description: Monday's earthquake has brought back terrible memories for both Syrians and Ukrainians in Gaziantep.

entries.title: Photos: Deadly quake intensifies suffering of displaced Syrians
entries.description: The disaster comes on the heels of severe winter storms, further adding to the misery of those left without shelter.

entries.title: Premier League charges Man City with alleged financial-rule break
entries.description: Manchester-based football club says they welcome review by independent commission.

entries.title: At least 34 people killed in clashes in Somaliland, hospital says
entries.description: Fighting erupts in the breakaway region between its forces and anti-government fighters, a Somaliland official says.

entries.title: For Syrians, earthquakes bring on yet another disaster
entries.description: Powerful quakes have left devastation in the war-hit country, exacerbating crises faced by IDPs and refugees.

entries.title: Why have the Turkey-Syria earthquakes been so deadly?
entries.description: Rapid and unregulated urbanisation is one of the factors that make cities 'critically vulnerable' to natural hazards.

entries.title: Canada is coming undone
entries.description: The nation, widely known and admired for its tolerance and kindness, is fraying thread by thread.

entries.title: Turkey, Syria earthquake death toll and devastation: Live tracker
entries.description: At least 1,014 deaths were reported in Turkey and 560 in Syria. The death toll is expected to keep rising.

entries.title: Severe weather hampers earthquake rescuers in Turkey and Syria
entries.description: Snow, rain and freezing conditions impede search and rescue operations as the quake death toll neared 1,400.

entries.title: Major earthquake hits Turkey, Syria: Which countries are helping
entries.description: A magnitude 7.8 earthquake has caused widespread devastation in Turkey and Syria.

entries.title: Israeli forces kill five Palestinians in Jericho raid
entries.description: Palestinians say the raid comes after a weeklong Israeli siege of the West Bank city.

entries.title: Mali expels UN mission’s human rights chief
entries.description: The Malian gov't said the decision was due to the choice of civil society witnesses for UN Security Council briefings.

entries.title: Timeline: Turkey hit by most devastating earthquake since 1999
entries.description: Turkey and Syria hit by magnitude 7.8 quake, the most deadly in Turkey since an earthquake in 1999 that killed 17,500.

entries.title: What is happening in Turkey, Syria? Key quake questions answered
entries.description: At least 641 were killed after the quake near Gaziantep, with hundreds of thousands of displaced Syrians affected.

entries.title: One peacekeeper killed in DRC after UN chopper comes under fire
entries.description: Sunday's incident comes a day after leaders of the East African Community held a summit on the DRC crisis, in Burundi.

entries.title: Adani sell-off continues amid protests by India’s opposition
entries.description: Seven listed Adani Group firms see a sell-off worth $112bn in under two weeks as the opposition widens protests.

entries.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 348
entries.description: As the Russia-Ukraine war enters its 348th day, we take a look at the main developments.

entries.title: Hundreds dead after strong earthquake strikes Turkey and Syria
entries.description: A 7.8 magnitude earthquake hit southern Turkey and northwest Syria, killing hundreds of people as buildings collapsed.

entries.title: Beyonce breaks Grammy record as Harry Styles takes best album
entries.description: The Recording Academy, which organises the Grammy's, has been trying to diversify its membership amid criticism.

entries.title: Ukraine to replace Reznikov amid corruption scandal: Legislator
entries.description: Oleksii Reznikov's removal would be the highest-profile change since a corruption scandal at his ministry last month.

entries.title: Strong earthquake hits southern Turkey near Syrian border
entries.description: Tremor measured at 7.8 magnitude was also felt in Syria, Lebanon and Cyprus causing buildings to collapse.

entries.title: Landmark trial of Hong Kong 47 begins amid tight security
entries.description: The group of pro-democracy politicians and activists are accused of subversion for organising an unofficial primary.

entries.title: US Navy working to recover debris from Chinese ‘spy balloon’
entries.description: The craft, which Beijing says was a meteorological airship blown off course, was shot down in the Atlantic Ocean.
